name: Quixiquoddal
description:
Stay over the lava to reach up as high as you can!

Controls:

Move left and right: A and D, the left and right directional keys, the left and right arrow keys, left or right on the d-pad, or by tilting left or right on the left analog stick.

Jump: Spacebar, W key, up directional key, up on the d-pad, tilt the left stick up, or any other button on a game pad.

Tip: Watch out for rocky blocks! They will crumble underneath you when you step on them!

Developed by Tyler Kortge with programming assistance from Hank Kauffman.

This game uses the Infinity Blade: Fire Lands content pack from the Unreal Engine Marketplace.
